channel.title: *Complete* User Posted SCAR Scripts
channel.description:
Hehe, I have too much time on my hands.
[b][u]Miners[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265.0.html][RS2] Varrock Essence Miner Script 0 Color Setup :D[/url] - By solmn wishes [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3629.0.html][RS2]Awesome Powerminer[/url] - By mjordan [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6648.0.html]Jareds miner *no anti randoms sorry*[/url] - By Jared [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,378.0.html][RS2] Bumis' Powerminer 1.0[/url] - By Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,262.0.html][rs2] powerminer script / colorless setup and very l33t mining procedure[/url] - By solemn wishes [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5326.0.html][RS2] Hobomans ESSENCE MINER[/url] - Posted by leeroy21
[b][u]Auto-Fighters[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1215.0.html]ThugFighter PRO[/url] - Posted by Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,54.0.html]Simple Killer By solemn wishes[/url] - Posted by yna_ajhear5 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2849.0.html][RS2] AFK Trainer[/url] - By !!1one!eleven1! [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3292.0.html]Stupid3ooo Auto Fighter[/url] - Posted by Ollie [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1260.0.html][RSC] Cracked AutoFighter 5.2 (Still working!][/url] - By Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6603.0.html]DArippy9324's Uber Fighter[/url] - By darippy [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7793.0.html]Evil_'s Autofighter![/url] - By Evil_ [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1978.0.html]BumFighter Pro 1.1 [Tested for HOURS] [AutoHeal!] [/url] - By Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1258.0.html]BumFighter Pro[/url] - By Bumis
[b][u]Auto-Talkers and Buyers[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,513.0.html][RS2] Tokul Gem Buyer [For those who use BumTokel][/url] - By Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1872.0.html][RS2] Dye Buyer[/url] - By KyleGut3 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2911.0.html]Dizzy-Auto-Talk Uber 1337 Auto Talker (Types Humanily!)[/url] - By Dizzy [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1874.0.html][RS2] Port Sarim: Rune Buyer Advance! [ ~ ][/url] - By Surajd [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6042.0.html][RS2] Auto Typer with Effects and Colors v.3 by Ron[/url] - By Ron [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6069.0.html][RS2] Pmh1000's Spammer[/url] - By Pmh1000 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6259.0.html][RS2] - Freddy1990's Featherbuyer V5.10[/url] - Freddy1990 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,496.0.html][RS2] BumTokel Advanced 2.1 [Updated sence last night][/url] - By Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7538.0.html]Easy use AutoTalker by Secet - v2.4 [Upgraded][/url] - By Secet [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7089.0.html]100 bottles of beer on the wall for RS (Idea from Ron)[/url] - By bullzeye95 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,14692.0.html][SRL][RS2] RIP RSC's autotalker[/url] - By R.I.P RSC

[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4765.0.html][RS2] Alchemy - Both Low And High, NO Colors And Easy Setup[/url] - By Pmh1000 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,9743.0.html]Camelot Teleporter [SCAR][/url] - By zsakul2 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,10284.0.html]Cosmic grinded! [u][b]Auto-Cutters[/b][/u]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,8240.0.html][SRL][RS2]PowerChopper[/url] - By WhiteShadow [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1742.0.html][RS2] Draynor Willow Smasher + Banker [ ~ ] [/url] - By Surajd [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5557.0.html]Simple Woodcutter of any Tree[/url] - By Jared [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5071.0.html][Rs2]Bow cutter--No Colors!!![/url] - By skys shadow [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11863.0.html]Power Cutter[/url] - By Nashi
[u][b]Loggers[/b][/u]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2281.0.html][Rs2] Tool - Bum Clicker[/url] - By Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,497.0.html]Bumis' Anti Logout 3.1 / Item Grabber[/url] - By Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4140.0.html]Super Log 1.00[/url] - By legolas5802 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2047.0.html][RS2] Tool - Never get logged out.[/url] - By Bumis [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,8628.0.html]Auto Door Closer/Locker V1.4[/url] - By Zach1188 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5640.0.html][RS2] AUTO LOGIN![/url] - By Ron
[u][b]Other[/b][/u]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,9808.0.html][SCAR]Dwarf Gnome Agility Course[SCAR][/url] - By zsakul2 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6009.0.html][RS2][0k][Â£0 GBP] FrostByte100\\\\\\\'s Free Scripts[/url] - By frostbyte100 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,8468.0.html]Flax0r By Pwnd ( Redo/Updating/Home/BigFish)[/url] - By Pwnd [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2198.0.html][RS2] RS Buddy - By me[/url] - By Iamadam [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,263.0.html][rs2] RuneScape Helping buddy - simple and easy to use tool - 0wnag3[/url] - By solemn wishes [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7455.0.html]*DEAD*s leet mouse procedure (updated again)[/url] - *DEAD* [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5009.0.html]Tutorial Island Flashing Arrow Clicker[/url] - By Aftermath_96
There they are.
Enjoy :)
I will update when I can :) If you see a broken link, let me know :)

item.title: *Complete* User Posted SCAR Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Doug Doug
item.description:
@Doug wrote:

Or guys maybe becacuse they are over a year old… look at the post dates. 2007’s… 2006’s as far as im aware SLR is dead and so is SCAR unless you going to write you own scripts or try and make do with the old ones avaliable outside this post you’ll need to go back to the old fashioned way of actually working for your self. Auto’ing was also made pretty redundant since the new trade limits etc which is why no-one is bothering anymore.

Read full topic
